[!windows] stop

# test chezmoi cd with command with args (Windows variant)
env HOME=$WORK${/}home3${/}user
env USERPROFILE=$WORK${/}home3${/}user
chezmoi cd
! stdout PowerShell
stdout works

-- home3/user/.config/chezmoi/chezmoi.toml --
[cd]
    command = "powershell"
    args = ["-nologo", "-command", "Write-Host 'works'"]
